name: Ali Parker
companyType: Experiential & Brand Marketing, Strategy and Production
education: Michigan State University - Bachelor of Arts in Marketing (2005 - 2009)

experience.title: Co-founder / Co-owner
experience.description: Built an agency from the ground up by optimizing existing relationships, creating new partnerships, and leveraging 10+ years of industry knowledge to grow revenue over 60% year over year (pre COVID-19).

experience.title: Experiential and Creative Producer
experience.description: Conceptualized and produced experiential marketing campaigns to increase brand awareness among key demographics. Led a team of creative freelancers and managed multiple projects simultaneously, resulting in repeated recruitment by the same clients.

experience.title: Director of Production
experience.description: Managed 12 key accounts and a team of 10+ at an experiential marketing agency. Influenced company strategy, improved employee retention by advocating for updated benefits, orchestrated cross-functional collaboration, and represented the executive team at events to oversee production and seek new business opportunities.

experience.title: Account Director
experience.description: Oversaw accounts and directed internal production and creative teams to align with brand teams for Mark Anthony Brands and Teva. Grew account revenues by building client relationships, identifying new opportunities, and exceeding project KPIs, resulting in increased budgets and profit margins.

experience.title: Senior Producer
experience.description: Strategized and executed over 30 events for major brands including Red Bull, Nike, and NASCAR. Trained a team of assistant producers and project coordinators, consistently met client expectations, and achieved project-specific KPIs, leading to repeat projects and client retention.

experience.title: Event Director || Warrior Dash
experience.description: Planned and executed over 25 domestic and international events in the entertainment industry. Developed event strategies, built vendor relationships resulting in significant savings, and led a team to manage P&L and analytics for flagship events.

experience.title: Production Manager || Firefly Music Festival
experience.description: Created on-site logistics and operations plans for a three-day festival with 30K daily attendance. Led the BOH production team, researched and vetted key vendors, and was a core member of the initial planning team responsible for site visits, permitting, and operations.

experience.title: Manager/Visual Merchandiser
experience.description: Assisted in discovering new product lines, designed window and in-store displays, hosted private events, styled outfits for shoots and clients, acted as a personal shopper, and created advertisements to promote sales and promotions.

bio: Strategic marketing and business development leader with 10+ years of experience and a demonstrated history of internal strategy, experiential marketing, brand strategy, creative direction, and team management. Out-of-the-box thinker with a talent for connecting people, teams, and brands to bring ideas to life.
